case.title: jokes, tokes and escapism - 30 (London )
case.text: Hello, I tend to spend my evenings in the library as opposed to socialising in pubs and clubs. I guess it is hard to reach out in London. Nevertheless, I would like to strike up a relationship with someone who shares my interests or at least my desire to get up, out and connect with someone. I am part bookish nerd part fun loving. The loving fun needs awakening. Carribean/irish heritage, busty curvy bbw. I'm looking for someone with inner geek who wants to transcend the aesthetic for a more sincere connection
